text.headline:
Trisha and Tuhin 6th Anniversary
2015 -
text.text: Wow, this is amazing, where did the six year go? \Trisha always says I forget things, well, this is a journal that I intend to keep with stories. This By

media.caption: Houston's mother and Gospel singer, Cissy Houston (left) and cousin Dionne Warwick.
media.credit:
Cissy Houston photo:Tom Marcello
Dionne Warwick: CBS Television via Wikimedia Commons

text.headline: A Musical Heritage
text.text: Born in New Jersey on August 9th, 1963, Houston grew up surrounded by the music business. Her mother is gospel singer Cissy Houston and her cousins are Dee Dee and Dionne Warwick.

media.caption: Houston, performing on Good Morning America in 2009.

text.headline:
Whitney Houston
1963-2012
text.text: Houston, 48, was discovered dead at the Beverly Hilton Hotel on on Feb. 11, 2012. She is survived by her daughter, Bobbi Kristina Brown, and mother, Cissy Houston.
